issue.title: [FlightRPC][C++] Client cookie generation should not wrap values in quotes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15546](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15546). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The ClientCookieMiddleware implementation in C++ incorrectly wraps each value in the generated Cookie header in quotes.

Values are permitted to be wrapped in quotes in the Set-Cookie header a server would emit, but not the Cookie header the client would send back.
